tool_description: API for Usage & Billing - Meter and Track your product's usage. Best for usage bases AI API-s.
name: Usage and Billing
title: Usage and Billing

api_list.name: Get account
Get meter
Get meters
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://usage-and-billing.p.rapidapi.com/meter"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "usage-and-billing.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
